Configuration.Name: Greeting with Voicemail
Configuration.Description: A simple greeting with the option to leave a voicemail.

Input.Name: IntroMessage
Input.DisplayName: [Your message]. If you'd like to leave a voicemail, please press 1.
Input.Description: Please define an intro message for your callers. This message will be played and will allow the caller to leave a voicemail message by pressing 1.
Input.Title: Intro Message

Configuration.Name: Hours and Directions
Configuration.Description: Allow callers to find out your hours of business and directions to your store.

Input.Name: WelcomeGreeting
Input.DisplayName: Thank you for calling [Your business name].
Input.Description: Please define a welcome greeting for your callers. Your callers will hear this greeting first.
Input.Title: Welcome Greeting

Input.Name: MainMenuGreeting
Input.DisplayName: For our hours of business, press 1. For directions to our store, press 2. To repeat this menu, press star.
Input.Description: Please define a main menu greeting for your callers. This greeting will be played after your main menu greeting and should give your callers a list of options they may choose from.
Input.Title: Main Menu Greeting

Input.Name: StoreHours
Input.DisplayName: Our store hours are [Your store hours].
Input.Description: Please define a recording of your store hours.
Input.Title: Store Hours

Input.Name: StoreDirections
Input.DisplayName: Our store is located at [Your store directions].
Input.Description: Please define a recording of your store directions.
Input.Title: Store Directions

Configuration.Name: Simple Restaurant
Configuration.Description: Hours, directions and a voicemail box for reservations.

Input.Name: WelcomeGreeting
Input.DisplayName: Thank you for calling [Your business name].
Input.Description: Please define a welcome greeting for your callers. Your callers will hear this greeting first.
Input.Title: Welcome Greeting

Input.Name: MainMenuGreeting
Input.DisplayName: For our hours of business, press 1. For directions, press 2. To make a reservation, press 3. To repeat this menu, press star.
Input.Description: Please define a main menu greeting for your callers. This greeting will be played after your main menu greeting and should give your callers a list of options they may choose from.
Input.Title: Main Menu Greeting

Input.Name: StoreHours
Input.DisplayName: Our hours of business are [your business hours].
Input.Description: Please define a recording of your business hours.
Input.Title: Business Hours

Input.Name: StoreDirections
Input.DisplayName: We are located at [your location and directions].
Input.Description: Please define a recording of your location and directions.
Input.Title: Location

Input.Name: ReservationMessage
Input.DisplayName: Please leave us a message with the details for your reservation. This should include the date, time, number of people and a number we can reach you at. We will return your call shortly to confirm the availability of your reservation. Thank you.
Input.Description: Define the greeting and instructions you want played when a person chooses to make a reservation.
Input.Title: Reservation Greeting and Instructions

ConfigurationCategory.Name: Real Estate
ConfigurationCategory.Description: Configurations for real estate brokers and agents.

Configuration.Name: Real Estate Agent
Configuration.Description: Allow callers to listen to featured listings and to make an appointment.

Input.Name: WelcomeGreeting
Input.DisplayName: Thank you for calling [your agency name]. [Mention your featured listing].
Input.Description: Please define a welcome greeting for your callers. Your callers will hear this greeting first.
Input.Title: Welcome Greeting

Input.Name: MainMenuGreeting
Input.DisplayName: To hear more information about our featured listing, please press 1. To list your home or to schedule an appointment for a showing, please press 2. To repeat this menu, press star.
Input.Description: Please define a main menu greeting for your callers. This greeting will be played after your main menu greeting and should give your callers a list of options they may choose from.
Input.Title: Main Menu Greeting

Input.Name: FeaturedListing
Input.DisplayName: Our featured listing is... [more information about your featured listing]. If you would like to schedule an appointment for this amazing property, please press 2.
Input.Description: Give your callers more information about your featured listing.
Input.Title: Featured Listing Details

Input.Name: AppointmentNumber
Input.Description: Enter a number to reach you at when the caller chooses to make an appointment.
Input.Title: Appointment Telephone Number

Input.Name: AppointmentMessage
Input.DisplayName: I'm sorry I wasn't able to take your call in person. If you leave your name and number, I will get back to you as soon as possible.
Input.Description: If you can't be reached at the phone number you defined earlier your callers can leave you a message. You can record your voicemail greeting here.
Input.Title: Appointment Voicemail Message
